name: Predaplant Spider Orchid
text: During the End Phase, if this card was Normal or Special Summoned this turn: You can discard 1 Plant monster; add 1 Level 4 or lower Plant monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Predaplant Spider Orchid" once per turn.
pendulum_text: During your Main Phase, if this card was activated this turn: You can target 1 other face-up card in the Spell & Trap Zone; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Predaplant Spider Orchid" once per turn.
